Description: Implement REST API for evidence registration. Endpoint: POST /api/v1/evidence. Storage: Postgres + Neo4j. Spec: OpenAPI 3.0.
Implement Neo4j schema for Claims, Evidence, DERIVED_FROM. Support bitemporal edges.
Integrate OPA to block exports without license. Policy: export.rego. Fail-closed.
Service to bundle sub-graph + proofs. Output: JSON-LD signed bundle. Input: Graph query + Audience.
Inject lineage hash into analytics output. Metadata: _provenance object with input/model hashes.
CLI to verify bundle signature and Merkle path. Command: summit-verify.
UI component in Tri-Pane. Show lineage, source, confidence for selected node.
UI Action for export. Select Audience. Handle LAC rejection gracefully.
Implement Proof-of-Non-Collection stub and Right-to-Reply metadata templates.
Test resilience to NATS/Redis outage. Ensure local queuing/WAL.
Security test to attempt bypassing LAC export restrictions.
Endpoint to sync append-only logs from offline collectors. Basic CRDT merge.
